trans-unit.source: Used to mark a method definition in an assembly as a trigger in SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 用于将标记中一个程序集作为 SQL Server 中的触发器的方法定义。

trans-unit.source: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical attributes used when the type is registered with SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 在特性上的属性反映在该类型注册使用 SQL Server 时使用的物理属性。

trans-unit.source: See "CLR Triggers" in SQL Server 2005 Books Online for more information on CLR triggers and examples.
trans-unit.target: CLR 触发器和示例的详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 2005 联机丛书中的"CLR 触发器"。

trans-unit.source: An attribute on a method definition in an assembly, used to mark the method as a trigger in SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 上一个程序集，用于将方法标记为 SQL Server 中的触发器的方法定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies that the trigger is activated by updating existing data (`UPDATE`) in the table `authors`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例指定通过更新现有数据来激活该触发器 (`UPDATE`) 表中`authors`。

trans-unit.source: The type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.
trans-unit.target: 触发器和数据操作语言 (DML) 操作激活该触发器的类型。

trans-unit.source: The DML action that activates the trigger could be an UPDATE, a DELETE, or an INSERT action.
trans-unit.target: 激活该触发器的 DML 操作可能是更新、 删除或插入操作。

trans-unit.source: The type of the trigger can be AFTER or INSTEAD OF.
trans-unit.target: 该触发器的类型可以是 AFTER 或 INSTEAD OF。

trans-unit.source: Specifying FOR for the trigger type is the same as specifying AFTER.
trans-unit.target: 指定对于触发器类型是相同后为指定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing the type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值表示触发器和数据操作语言 (DML) 操作激活该触发器的类型。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing the name of the trigger.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值表示该触发器的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The table to which the trigger applies.
The following example specifies that the trigger is referenced by using the name `trig_onpubinsert`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例指定使用的名称引用此触发器`trig_onpubinsert`。

trans-unit.source: The trigger is activated by adding new data (`INSERT`) to the table `publishers`.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加新数据来激活触发器 (`INSERT`) 到表`publishers`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing the table name.
